"The Recycle Shop":
"About the Recycle Shop

Here, you can exchange items that you own for products on the Goods List.
The items needed will vary depending on the product.

For some products, such as Excubes, you can perform multiple exchanges at once by selecting more than one exchange's worth of items.

The products available may change based on time or what special events are currently running.
